1.content:
Welcome to the virtual world where your created virtual characters can explore, meet new people, or fight monsters. Also the story itself change depending on the choices you make.

Now before we get started there are few rules to understand:

1.Death is allowed but you will end up at the last town or it will end the story.
2.You will gain experience points when you defeat monsters. (look at monster and level charts for details).
3.If it don't have anything to with the story I will delete or rewrite the chapter.
4.Have fun.

Also you can use any RPG rules you like unless you check the monster and level charts item for exp required for each level.

Now choose which storyline to start.
1.title: Getting started

11.content:
Hello everybody my name is soulsilver and I am a nine-tailed ice fox subhuman. I started my adventure at a seaside village taking quests that were available. As for my preferences I like using swords and fire base magic but I dislike using long-range weapons. Right now I don't have any allies so I am deciding that I want to look for new teammates or I can take on this monster quest on the bulletin board.

Which choice will I choose?
11.title: Soulsilver: the nine-tail ice fox

choices: To the town of earth and fire (2 day trip)
To the town of ice (4 day trip)
Sail to the deepsea shrine (2 hour ship ride)
111.content:
I decided to look around the village with no luck on finding anybody to join me until I saw two warriors exauasted and beaten up. I walked up to them and asked them what happened. They said.

Unknown male:"We were attacked by a pack of wolves."

Unknown female:"They were too for us so we had to run away from them."

Soulsilver:"Well come with me and I'll take you to the inn so you both can rest up."

And with that they went to the inn for the night.

The following morning...

Soulsilver:"I see your both awake."

Hank:"Yeah and let me introduce myself I'm Hank."

Ruby:"And I am Ruby."

Hank:"So what are you doing in a place like this."

Soulsilver:" Well my parents died when I was 12 and I decided to become a swordsman so I can travel to different places and meet new people."

Ruby:"It must be rough to know that your parents are dead."

Soulsilver:"It is."

After their conversation the three warriors decided to adventure together. They were deciding on where to go next.
111.title: Hank and Ruby

1113.content:
"Why don't we go to the deepsea shrine." Hank says. "That's a good idea Hank because the level requirement is 20->30 and it will be easy to level up in there." Soulsilver says.

And with that they rented a ship for 300 gold to get to the shrine. The sailing was going so smoothly they decided to discuss a good stratagy when they go inside the shrine.

-1 hour to destination-

"hey guys i'm going to check outside ok." Hank said. After that Hank went outside to check the view until he spots something odd. "What is that." Upon seeing the strange shadow hank went to get the others which are still resting inside cabin. "Hey guys there is something big in the water. You have to come and see it." Hank says. The three warriors went back outside to see what this strange shadow is. "What is that." Ruby says. Soulsilver said. "I don't know i think it is."
1113.title: Sail to the deepsea shrine (2 hour ship ride)

11131.content: Was it the kraken or a giant sea snake?
11131.title: a giant monster [kraken/giant sea snake]

11132.content:
"It's the deepsea shrine." Soulsilver said. The three warriors got off the ship and headed inside the shrine.

Deepsea Shrine

"Whoa this place is huge." Ruby said. "Hey soulsilver what are we doing here anyway." Hank questioned. "Well we are here on two accounts. One, we're here to train and second, the paper i picked up from the bulletin board contained a double hunt because there were recent disturbences in this shrine according to this paper. The monsters we are here to hunt is the kraken and the giant sea snake." Soulsilver answered. "Well there are two doors." Ruby said. "I guess we should split up then. I'll go left and hunt the giant sea snake and you two go right and take the kraken." Soulsilver suggested. "Right." Hank and Ruby said together.

Which path to follow...
11132.title: the Deepsea shrine

111321.content:
"hmm it looks like the monster was here a while ago. Well i better head down that submerged tunnel." Soulsilver cautiously dove inside the tunnel and swam deeper and deeper until he came across a large underwater door gaurded by four Electric Jellyfish. "I better take these guys out before i open that door."

BATTLE START

Soulsilver
Hp-1255
Mp450

Electric Jellyfish(x4)
Hp-120
Mp-75

Player turn- I cast fireball barrage(cost 125 mp). It does 50 gamage to each opponent.

Enemy turn- They attack with thunderstrike(cost 75 mp). Doing a total damage of 650 points.

Player turn- I cast fireball barrage again. "CRITICAL" Does 100 damage.

End of battle: you gain 1600 exp and 220 gold.

Level up! +200 hp +50 mp +5 atk +10 mag +12 def +2 spd (now level 21).
New skill acquired: Thunder Spear

Now let's finish this battle.
111321.title: Hunting the Giant Sea Snake

choices: Hank and ruby comes and help out
An unknown fighter comes and assist you
1113211.content:
The giant doors open and soulesilver enters with caution. As he enters the huge chamber he found out that it's too quiet. "Hmm it's too quite in here." Just then the doors slam shut blocking his only way out. "Looks like i'm stuck here unless i find a... wait whats that over there." Over on the other side of the room soulsilver spots a blue gem but as he goes to get it the room starts shaking badly and of a sudden five giant sea snakes appear from the water half of the room. "Whoa this could be bad but i got to defeat them in order to get out. Well here goes nothin."

-Battle start-

"Man this going to be very hard taking out each one seperately. If only i had some extra help."

Just then someone comes but who is it.....

11132111.content:
Hank and Ruby came to help you. "It looks like you guys made it just in time."

11132111.title: Hank and ruby comes and help out

111321111.content:
Exp gained- 10000
Gold gained- 17500

Soulsilver leveled up to 27

Hp+1255, Mp+ 345, Atk+ 35, Def+ 45, Mag+ 25, Spd+15

Hank leveled up to 24

Hp+ 955, Mp+ 135, Atk+ 65, Def+ 35, Mag+10, Spd+ 25

Items Gained

Blue Gem

Soulsilver: "Phew that was close. If you guys haven't shown up i might died back there."

Hank: "No prob."

Ruby: "Well we got what we came here for. Let's get out of here."

And with that the three heros left the temple to get back to the main land.

Harbor Village

Soulsilver: "Thanks for helping me out guys."

Hank: " No prob."

Ruby: " Well we must be going."

Soulsilver: " Cya."

-Hank and Ruby left the party-

End of story 1
111321111.title: After battle Spoils

1113211111.content:
-Harbor Village Pub-

Soulsilver: Hmm where should i go next.

While Soulsilver figures out on where to go next, a couple of strange people enters the pub.

Shady guy 1: Are you sure the Red Gem is secure in the Volcano.

Shady guy 2: Yeah the beast is guarding it.

Shady guy 1: What about the Green Gem and the Yellow Gem.

Shady guy 2: The Green Gem is secure in the Mountain Ice Cave and the Yellow Gem is secure in the Ancient Ruins.

Shady guy 1: Good let's get out of here and report to the boss.

Shady guy 2: Right.

Soulsilver: Hmm it looks like i'm going to three places first. Let's see the Volcano is the closest, then the Mountain Ice Cave, and finally the Anchient Ruins. But first i will need another ice weapon and some armor if i'm going to the Volcano.
1113211111.title: Story 2: New Beginnings

11132111111.content:
-The Volcano Shrine-

Soulsilver- Phew it's really hot in here. I better find this and get out of here before i die of heat exhaustion.

Mission-Find the Red Gem

Soulsilver wanders in the temple looking for any clues on the Red Gem until he saw something that caught his eye.

Soulsilver- Hmm what was that. I better take a look.

-Soulsilver enters a large chamber-
11132111111.title: The Volcano Shrine

111321111111.content:
Soulsilver- Oh you got to be kidding me a Three Headed Pyrohydra and a Red Dragon. This could get ugly.

Looks like you could use some help.

Soulsilver- Thanks.

111321111111.title: continue

12.content:
Sylvana yawned as the first morning light stroke her face. She stood up and went outside the barn to plunge her head in the bucket of cold water next to the door.
"Woah!" Her fair shout resounded in the clearing, a few frightened birds flying away in the sun.
"Great day today! The girania and the patkineses will certainly have blossomed in the night, ready for me to pluck them. Let's go!"
As a druid, Sylvana used to converse with the surrounding nature, a thing as noble and normal where others considered she was crazy. To any human, she looked like a ten year old, but she was already eighteen, slender on her muscular legs, and small, yet four and a half feet tall. That was quite a lot for a halfling.
She went back in and slipped into her brown jerkin and leggins, straightening her clothes with a large brown leather belt. She fixed a few pouches on it, and strapped her shoulder bag. Looking at the mirror splitter next to the door, she took a comb and tried to straighten her curly hair.
"Nice try..." she mumbled at her reflection, smiling under her freckles. It was not the first time she had cursed the rusty lion mane nature had given her. Anway, she was not going to find her prince on that day!
She went out, barefooted as it was her habit. A little river meandered behind the barn she had found abandoned some time before, and had then claimed hers, no soul coming ever to protest. Having passed the shadowy wall where a few hens where picking the grass, she whistled between her teeth a high-pitched tone.
Immediately, a hoarse and dark groan rose from the very farthest corner of her modest property, next to the north path of the clearing.
"Muchpinks! Where are you, lousy, lazy creature? We've got work to do, come on!" she yelled.
A slight vibration at her feet let her know Muchpinks had began to march off in her direction.
"Come on, old boy!" She smiled as she saw a tiger paw appear behind the wooden wall. He was really of great stature, brown with black stripes, his greenish eyes slightly twinkling in the early sunlight.
"Where we go now?" he whispered softly.
"To the southern path. We have one hour until the girania and the patkineses close their petal crowns and hide their precious gift from us. You know that I am quicker on your back than on my little feet, don't you?"
Muchpinks nodded involuntarily.
She bent forwards, close enough to his furry ears. "I've seen a couple of juicy rat-rabbits there yesterday. I suppose that they are no match for a grown-up Tilly tiger like you. Or am I wrong?"
Muchpinks' ears twitched of delight. He did not need further motivation to go down the smooth slope of the clearing and disappear within the chilly shadows of the southern path.

***

"You could have let me try, at least!"
Muchpinks was laying on his full tummy, gnawing on a remaining bone. These rat-rabbits were simply delicious. But maybe with some berries, or salmon fish, would they taste even better? Muchpinks was thinking about new receipes, Sylvana in the corner of his eyes, as his ears caught a faint sound coming from the left.
Sylvana straightened up from the girania she had just milked, sealing the pouch with a small cork. She put a finger on her lips but Muchpinks had already sniffed the danger.
All of a sudden, without any warning, a troop of five goblins came out of the shadows. This would have been no problem for Muchpinks if they had not been flanked by three dire wolves, fletching with their teeth, and longing to taste blood.
Sylvana stared at each one before turning to Muchpinks. In that very moment, she really regretted her stupidity, having left her quarterstaff in the barn, next to her bed camp.

***

What will Sylvana and Muchpinks do now?
1) Escape?
2) Attack?
3) Bargain?
12.title: Sylvana the Druid

123.content:
Swallowing audibly, Sylvana spoke aloud.
"Hey you folk, ain't it too early for ya? Though, looking at your pale faces, a little sun won't harm you..."
The goblins looked at each other, their little saliva dripping mouths half open. They were not used to speak with their food before eating it. And that one was rather unfrightened.
A hoarse laugh escaped the chief of the group, a smirk adorning his ugly, scar covered half blind face. A red stone had been pressed in his left orbit, Sylvana catching a glimpse of it in a sunray. Instead of answering, he clutched the shoddy axe he had unsheathed with his little hand. Manicure seemed to be a nasty thing for them, judging by the long, yellowish nails the boss showed.
Muchpinks stared at the other dangers: three tall wolves, full of virulent lust to kill. Their snarling mouths wide open now left no doubts about their lethal intentions.
"Hey boys, your mommas never taught you it's bad education not to answer a lady?" Sylvana put on a serious smile. She thought she could speak her way out of it. But she soon enough came to the conclusion that this pair of buddies were not looking forward to play Sunken Heads with her. How she'd loved to play that game again... But not under these circumstances.
"Sylvana..." Muchpinks began to mumble in the corner of his whiskers. "Speak is no good."
She too understood that they had no real choice.
The five goblins laughed sardonically at the sight of that weak prey. They clenched their sabers, swords and axes, taking one cautious step ahead.
Sylvana sighed aloud, and concluded their little verbal exchange.
"Alright boys, as you wish!"

# # #

What will Sylvana and Muchpinks do?
1) Escape?
2) Attack?
123.title: A Little Chit-Chat

info.brief_description: This is based off virtual character creation that I created. Let your imagination run wild
info.description: This interactive story is where you take your created characters from the virtual character creation that I created. Feel free to start your own story with your character if you wish to. Also feel free to add chapters because I like this story to be interesting and fun for all.
